    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:ce3184b9680987282e6d985b489d10348c33b1b8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>ce3184b9680987282e6d985b489d10348c33b1b8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Minu kass</string>
            <string language="en">My cat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meine Katze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon chat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meu gato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mio gatto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γάτα μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi gato</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Lastele tutvustatakse kasside kombeid, mis värvi nad on, mida nad söövad jms. Seetõttu areneb laste kirjaoskus ja suhtumine koduloomadesse.</string>
            <string language="en">Children are introduced the manners of cats, their colour, what they eat, etc. Through this work develop writing skills and children’s attitude to domestic animals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Loomad</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kindern werden die Weise der Katzen, ihrer Farbe,
was sie essen, usw. eingeführt. Durch diese Arbeit entwickeln 
Sie Schreiben Fähigkeiten und children?s Haltung zu den Haustieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des enfants sont présentés les façons des 
chats, de leur couleur, ce qu'ils mangent, etc... Par ce travail
développez l'attitude de qualifications et de children?s d'écriture 
aux animaux domestiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças são introduzidas as maneiras dos 
gatos, da sua cor, o que comem, etc.. Através deste trabalho 
desenvolva a atitude das habilidades e dos children?s da escrita aos 
animais domésticos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini sono introdotti i modi dei gatti, del 
loro colore, che cosa mangiano, ecc. Attraverso questo lavoro 
sviluppi l'atteggiamento di abilità e dei children?s di scrittura 
agli animali domestici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά εισάγονται τους τρόπους των γατών, το χρώμα
τους, τι τρώνε, κ.λπ.... Μέσω αυτού η εργασία αναπτύσσει 
τις δεξιότητες και children?s τη στάση σύνταξης εγγράφου 
απέναντι στα κατοικίδια ζώα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducen a los niños las maneras de los gatos, 
de su color, qué comen, etc. A través de este trabajo 
desarrolle la actitud de las habilidades y de los children?s de la 
escritura a los animales domésticos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de base</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
